DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether non-invasive ultrasound method assessment coronary blood flow , transthoracic Doppler echocardiography-coronary flow reserve ( TTDE-CFR ) , used measure drug effect .
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study Coronary Flow Reserve Measurements , Non-Invasive Method Coronary Function Measurements
DOC.criteria: Males age 4575 year females aged 6075 year inclusive Carotid and/or femoral atherosclerotic plaque , assess carotid ultrasound examination within last 5 year Abnormal concentration lipids lipoprotein blood Provision sign informed consent Treatment statins lipidlowering drug , e.g . fibrates , nicotinic acid , cholesterol absorption inhibitor , within last 6 month randomisation Current smoking snuff tobacco use Major CV event ( myocardial infarction ( MI ) , stroke/ transitory ischemic attack ( TIA ) , Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) , revascularisation ) within last 6 month randomisation Symptomatic carotid stenosis , atrioventricular ( AV ) block , QTprolongation , atrial fibrillation , sinus node disease ( sick sinus syndrome symptomatic bradycardia ) , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) asthma
